snippet: Whether answering an opponent’s challenge to fight or mentoring a young linemate, Ilya Kovalchuk does what it takes to win.
abstract: New Jersey Devils winger Ilya Kovalchuk is fitting in fine after 18 months with the team; does what it takes to win, demonstrating how a star can also be a team player.
lead_paragraph: Whether answering an opponent’s challenge to fight or mentoring a young linemate, Ilya Kovalchuk does what it takes to win.

headline.seo: Ilya Kovalchuk Leads Devils by Example
headline.main: Kovalchuk Demonstrating to Devils How Star Can Also Be Team Player
headline.print_headline: Kovalchuk Demonstrating to Devils How Star Can Also Be Team Player
